ygData.subject: Re: Clash
ygData.msgSnippet: Gemini Dragon seemed unaffected by Radistors plea and soon took off and sped past him cutting off his escape. HE then slammed a foot into Radistors neck

Subject: Re: Clash

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Legendarynemasis@...

Gemini Dragon seemed unaffected by Radistors plea and soon took off 
and sped past him cutting off his escape. HE then slammed a foot into 
Radistors neck hopefully knocking him back.

Gemini Dragon: "We are here to make sure the future is not altered. 
You guys will cause damage to the timeline already and Deemos will 
die if he persists in attacking on this world and in the past."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Radistor ripped free and rolled across the ground. It seemed that 
the gestalt was acrobatic, kind of like how the bio cards always 
portray the Beast Wars gestalts. He stands up.
> 
> Radistor: You don't realize how important we are in history. Deemos 
single handedly won a war, and his destruction could mean yours, for 
all anyone knows.
> 
> Radistor acted like he was going to attack, then wheels flipped out 
of his feet and he spun around in the other direction, running from 
the battle...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Legendarynemasis@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Saturday, July 14, 2001 10:59 PM
>   Subject: Re: Clash
> 
> 
>   Gemini Dragon growls and hisses as the punch is countered with 
its 
>   tail which clamps down on the arm and gun which was headed 
towards 
>   one of its heads. A second later The Liquid Nitrogen spouting 
head 
>   unleashes a freeze beam at the second arm as Gemin dragons flaps 
its 
>   wings and begins to lift off into the air threatening to take 
>   Radistor with him.
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   > OOC: Yeah, I know, but Train Wreck has an anti-electricity 
system. 
>   I gave him that because he carries passengers.
>   > 
>   > BIC: Train Wreck is knocked over by the tail.
>   > 
>   > Train Wreck: Alright.
>   > 
>   > Stronghold and Blender both stepped out of Train Wreck and 
dropped 
>   to the ground from his now several feet off of the ground door.
>   > 
>   > Stronghold: It's too small in there.
>   > 
>   > They both transform into feet. Train Wreck changes into the 
body. 
>   Stranato and Airbomber change into the arms, and they all connect 
>   together. Doom ice and Rizopas both transform into huge guns and 
>   attach to the arms. Radistor was formed once again.
>   > 
>   > Radistor: We don't want to screw up time, we're Maximals!
>   > 
>   > Radistor swung a huge punch at Gemini Dragon's face. (Radistor 
is 
>   and always has been 50 feet tall)
>   >
